name: Pointy Adventure
description:
Z - jump 

Arrow keys to move 

Welcome to Pointy Adventure, a thrilling platform game where you must guide your character through a world full of danger and obstacles. Using the arrow keys, you can move left and right, and with the Z key, you can jump to avoid hazards and reach higher platforms.

to do a double jump you must collect balloons.

This game is a prototype , very short only 15 lvls
